title: Word: Easily switch between editing, reviewing, and viewing a document in Word for Windows and Word for Mac
description:
You can now switch between editing, reviewing, and viewing documents in Word based on the job that you are working on. (e.g., Viewing allows you to read the document without making accidental changes. Reviewing allows you to leave behind suggestions via tracked changes or comments).
More info: https://insider.office.com/en-us/blog/easily-switch-between-editing-reviewing-and-viewing-documents-in-word
